title: Average price for properties for sale in Rome , Italy 2019 , by area
yAxis: Price in euros per square meter
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Price in euros per square meter for 12 number of Areas.
The Price in euros per square meter is appeared to be the highest at Area Centro Storico and lowest at Area Gregorio VII Baldo degli Ubaldi.
The difference of Price in euros per square meter between the highest and lowest Area is 3845.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Area in the x axis and Price in euros per square meter in the y axis.
The maximum Price in euros per square meter 7817.0 is found at Area Centro Storico and the minimum is found at Gregorio VII Baldo degli Ubaldi where Area is 3972.0.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Area in the x axis and Price in euros per square meter in the y axis.
The Price in euros per square meter is highest at Area Centro Storico and lowest at Area Gregorio VII Baldo degli Ubaldi.
The difference of Price in euros per square meter between the highest and lowest Area is 3845.0.

Area Centro Storico is higher than any other Areas with value 7817.0, followed by Aventino San Saba Caracalla, and Parioli Flaminio. Down to Area Gregorio VII Baldo degli Ubaldi with the lowest value 3972.0.
The Area Centro Storico tends to be 1.54 percent higher than average.
